title: Jobs at Art Museums (JAM 2022): External Affairs
short_description: Meet staff who manage the museum’s brand, share our mission-focused narrative, and foster relationships with external audiences including visitors, donors, volunteers, media, and civic partners.
header_description: JAM is a unique opportunity for college students to make professional connections and learn about careers in the museum field.
list_description: Meet staff who manage the museum’s brand, share our mission-focused narrative, and foster relationships with external audiences including visitors, donors, volunteers, media, and civic partners.
description:
Meet staff who manage the museum’s brand, share our mission-focused narrative, and foster relationships with external audiences including visitors, donors, volunteers, media, and civic partners.

Speakers:
Maddie Shearer, Associate Director of Institutional Relations, Development

Alonso Tapia, Assistant Director of Leadership Giving and Special Events, Engagement

Courtney Graham, Associate Director of Engagement Programs, Engagement

Shannon Mae Burke, Associate Director of Marketing, Marketing and Communications

Participation by museum staff and departments does not indicate a need to hire. Staff will not be accepting resumes or offering interviews. For questions, email universitypartners@artic.edu.
